titleStmt.title: A briefe summe of Christian religion collected for a preparation to the Lords Supper / published for the benefit of the simpler sort of people of the parish of Saint Lawrence by Thomas Sanderson Doctor in Divinitie.
titleStmt.author: Sanderson, Thomas, 1560 or 61-1614.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E.P. for F. Coules at his shop in the Old-Bayly neere the Sessions-house,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
